means: 变为，成为（ become的过去式 ）

sentence.Network_en: He actually became convinced that the nurses had an unanswerable case.
sentence.Network_cn: 他实际上已经相信了护士们的情况确实如此。

sentence.Network_en: A new generation of scientists became fascinated by dinosaurs.
sentence.Network_cn: 新一代科学家对恐龙研究着了迷。

sentence.Network_en: The crowds became violent and threw petrol bombs at the police.
sentence.Network_cn: 人群变得狂暴起来，并向警察投掷汽油弹。

PerfectNetExp.abs: the church became a sanctuary for the refugees ., 教堂成为这些难民的庇护所.
if they sulked（ 闹情绪,快快不乐）, growing（生长的,不断增加的,适于成长的） cool if they became（变得） angry. And here she had practically（实际上,
zhang ziyi became a star overnight ., 章子怡忽然成了明星.

...Father,and that the Father Himself was born and suffered and died.)按照希坡利达，奴爱达大胆地说，圣父改变了自己的形态(mode of being)，变成(became)他的儿子。奴爱达自己是这样说，当圣父尚未降生时，他当被称为父、但他按自己的美意，服在降世为人之下时，他就出生，成为圣子、是他自己(He of Himself)，并不是另一位.

list.abs: So losing battle I have fought since I became a journalist ., 自从我成为记者一来就从事于一场毫无希望的斗争中.
Short before celebration of Millennium , I became grandmother ., 在千年庆典前不久 , 我成了祖母.
they became our marketing arm .他们成了我们在推销方面的得力助手。
they became pawns in the political battle ., 他们成为政治斗争的工具.
八年级下册英语词组_百度知道 ... over the world 遍及全世界 became famous 因…而出名 next to 挨着.
八年级下册英语词组_百度知道 ... over the world 遍及全世界 became famous 因…而出名 next to 挨着.

entry.def: Became is the past tense of become.

auth_sentence.content: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.
auth_sentence.res_content: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Pretty soon it gained popularity and became big business.

auth_sentence.content: It became epic, dusted with bold musical statements.
auth_sentence.res_content: It became epic, dusted with bold musical statements.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It became epic, dusted with bold musical statements.

auth_sentence.content: The system he helped devise became known as Siteswap.
auth_sentence.res_content: The system he helped devise became known as Siteswap.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The system he helped devise became known as Siteswap.

Sentence.sentence: But because you can't drive a car and watch television at the same time, rush hour became radio's prime, while music, talk, and news radio greatly enlarged their audiences.
Until ships became large enough (and engines small enough) to mount two engines side by side, they needed to keep sails
She became one of the richest and most hated women in the world.
I became aware of the trials of career-focused European woman a few years ago when I met a post-doctoral student from Germany who was then a visiting fellow at Johns Hopkins.
Starting in the 1980s, skill in finance grew in importance, and, as depicted in the news media and the movies, became a more appealing source of income.
And Warren Buffett, the good-natured financier, became a homespun folk hero, without the tools and overalls (工作服)
